trans-unit.source: Provides methods to manage the global designer verbs and menu commands available in design mode, and to show some types of shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder til å behandle globale designer verb og kommandoer tilgjengelig i utformingsmodus, og vise enkelte dokumenttyper hurtigmenyer.

trans-unit.source: This interface provides methods to: - Find, invoke, add and remove global designer verb commands.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet inneholder metoder for å: – Finn, aktivere, legge til og fjerne globale designer verbkommandoer.

trans-unit.source: - Find, invoke, add and remove standard menu commands.
trans-unit.target: – Finn, aktivere, legge til og Fjern standard kommandoer.

trans-unit.source: - Alter the event handlers associated with standard menu commands.
trans-unit.target: -Endre hendelsesbehandling som er knyttet til standard kommandoer.

trans-unit.source: - Display a shortcut menu of standard commands that is associated with a menu <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: – Vis en hurtigmeny med standard kommandoer som er knyttet til en meny <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs represent custom-defined commands that are listed on the shortcut menu in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer verb representerer egendefinert kommandoer som vises på hurtigmenyen i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: A designer verb can provide a specified text label.
trans-unit.target: Et designer verb kan gi en angitt etikett.

trans-unit.source: Each designer verb is automatically assigned a unique <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: Hver designer verbet er automatisk tilordnet en unik <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: A designer can provide designer verbs through its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property, but these are only available when the designer's component is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: En designer kan gi designer verb via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen, men dette er bare tilgjengelige når den designer-komponenten er valgt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Global designer verbs are designer verb commands that can be accessed from a design-mode shortcut menu regardless of the selected component.
trans-unit.target: Globale designer verb er designer verbkommandoer som kan åpnes fra en utformingsmodus hurtigmeny uavhengig av den valgte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: This interface allows you to manage the set of global designer verbs that are available in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet lar deg administrere settet med globale designer verb som er tilgjengelige i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: You can add a global designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method, and you can remove a global designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en global designer verbet ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>-metoden, og du kan fjerne en global designer verbet ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can invoke a designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> method if you know the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> of the verb.
trans-unit.target: Du kan aktivere en designer verbet ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>metoden hvis du kjenner den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>av verbet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A> property of this interface contains the current set of designer verb commands to display in a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>for dette grensesnittet inneholder gjeldende sett med designer verbkommandoer som vises i en hurtigmeny.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: This set of designer verb commands consists of all global designer verbs and any designer verbs offered by the designer of any currently selected component.
trans-unit.target: Dette settet med designer verbkommandoer består av alle globale designer verb og designer verb som tilbys av designer med noen komponent som er merket.

trans-unit.source: This set of verbs is updated each time a component with a designer offering designer verb commands is selected or deselected.
trans-unit.target: Dette settet med verb oppdateres hver gang en komponent med en designer og designer verbkommandoer velges eller oppheves.

trans-unit.source: Menu commands are limited to the set of predefined standard commands.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoer er begrenset til settet med forhåndsdefinert standard kommandoer.

trans-unit.source: Most of the predefined standard commands are defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: De fleste forhåndsdefinerte standard kommandoene er definert i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>opplistingene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, and invoke menu commands, and search for menu commands that have been added to a menu using methods of this interface.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til, fjerne, aktivere kommandoer og søke etter kommandoer som er lagt til en meny med metoder på dette grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: You can add a standard menu command using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method, and remove a standard menu command using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en standard menyen kommandoen ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>metoden og fjerner en standard menyen kommandoen ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can attach an event handler to a predefined standard menu command by following the procedure detailed in the documentation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte en hendelsesbehandling til en forhåndsdefinert standard kommando ved å følge fremgangsmåte beskrives i dokumentasjonen for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve a menu command by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> if it has been added to a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente kommando på en av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>Hvis den er lagt til en menyen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: You can invoke a menu command or designer verb command by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan aktivere en kommando eller designer verbet kommando etter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An attempt to add a menu command with an already existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Et forsøk på å legge til en menykommando med en eksisterende <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: When adding a menu command, be sure to check that it is not already on a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, or use exception handling wisely.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en kommando, må du kontrollere at den ikke allerede finnes på en meny med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>metoden eller fornuftig Bruk unntaksbehandling.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A menu command can be added to a menu, and have its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> properties set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kommando på en kan legges til en meny, og har de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>egenskapene til `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot visually locate a menu command that has been added on a menu, one of these properties may have been set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke finner kommando på en som er lagt til i en meny visuelt, ett av disse egenskapene kan ha blitt satt `false`.

trans-unit.source: You can show certain standard shortcut menus containing menu commands at a specified location using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise enkelte standard hurtigmenyer som inneholder kommandoer i en angitt plasseringen ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A>metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: The documentation for this method contains a table listing the command IDs that specify the valid menus to show.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentasjonen for denne metoden inneholder en tabell med kommandoen IDene som angir gyldig menyene skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified standard menu command to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte standard kommandoen i menyen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> enumerations contain <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> identifiers for predefined standard commands and menu commands that are already associated with a location on a particular menu.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>opplistinger inneholde <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>IDer for forhåndsdefinert standard kommandoer og kommandoer som allerede er knyttet til en plassering på en bestemt meny.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An attempt to add a menu command with an already existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Et forsøk på å legge til en menykommando med en eksisterende <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: When adding a menu command, be sure to check that it is not already on a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, or use exception handling wisely.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en kommando, må du kontrollere at den ikke allerede finnes på en meny med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>metoden eller fornuftig Bruk unntaksbehandling.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can attach an event handler to a predefined menu command with the following procedure: 1.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte en hendelsesbehandling til forhåndsdefinerte kommando på en med følgende fremgangsmåte: 1.

trans-unit.source: If the menu command to link with an event handler has been added to a menu, or is located with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, consider whether you wish to restore this menu command later, and whether you want to invoke the current event handler from your new event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis menykommandoen for å koble til en hendelsesbehandling er lagt til en meny eller er plassert med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>metoden, bør du vurdere om du vil gjenopprette denne kommandoen senere, og om du vil aktivere hendelsesbehandlingen gjeldende fra nye hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your code might restore the menu command or chain the invocation of event handlers, be sure to store a reference to the menu command somewhere.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koden kan gjenopprette kommando eller kjede for aktivering av hendelsesbehandling, må du lagre en referanse til kommandoen et eller annet sted.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that any previously existing menu command with the same <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> has been removed from the menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at alle tidligere eksisterende menykommando med samme <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>har blitt fjernet fra i menyen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> and specify your event handler in the constructor, along with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> representing the command to add.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, og angi hendelsesbehandlingen i konstruktøren, sammen med en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>som representerer kommandoen skal legges til.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Each standard menu command is associated with a predefined menu location where it is added to.
trans-unit.target: Hver standard kommando er knyttet til en forhåndsdefinert menyplassering der det legges til.

trans-unit.source: The supported command IDs are defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: Støttede kommandoen-IDer er definert i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>opplistingene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>

trans-unit.source: If you want to invoke any preexisting event handler for the menu command, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> method of the menu command you have replaced on the menu from the event handler that handles the invoke event of your menu command.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere eventuelle eksisterende hendelsesbehandlingen for kommandoen, kaller den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>metode for kommandoen du har byttet på menyen fra hendelsesbehandlingen behandler invoke-hendelsen for menykommando.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in restoring the event handler of a preexisting menu command that you have replaced, add the stored, preexisting menu command after you remove the replacement menu command you created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjenopprette hendelsesbehandlingen for eksisterende kommando på en som du har erstattet, Legg til den lagrede, eksistere kommandoen når du har fjernet kommandoen erstatning du opprettet.

trans-unit.source: You may want to add this behavior to the `Dispose` method for your type.
trans-unit.target: Du vil legge til dette problemet til den `Dispose` metoden for din.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> is already present on a menu.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> for det angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> finnes allerede i en meny.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified designer verb to the set of global designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Legger til det angitte designer verbet settet med globale designer verb.

trans-unit.source: Designers of components that provide designer verbs should use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of their designer rather than calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere komponenter som gir designer verb skal bruke den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>for sine designer i stedet for å kalle denne metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a global designer verb that can be accessed from the right-click shortcut menu in design mode regardless of the currently selected component.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden legger til et global designer verb som er tilgjengelig på hurtigmenyen for høyreklikking i utformingsmodus uavhengig av den valgte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified command ID and returns the menu command associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter den angitte kommando-IDen, og returnerer kommandoen knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the command ID, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no command is found.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> tilknyttet kommando-IDen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det ikke finnes noen kommando.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a menu or designer verb command matching the specified command ID.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en meny eller designer verbet kommando samsvarer med den angitte kommando-IDen.

trans-unit.source: This method searches for a menu command or designer verb with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> matching the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker etter en kommando eller designer verbet med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>samsvarer med den angitte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: This method first searches within the designer verbs collection consisting of global and active designer-provided verbs before continuing the search, if necessary, through the global environment command service.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker først i samlingen designer verb som består av global og aktiv angitt designer verb før du fortsetter søket, eventuelt gjennom tjenesten globale miljøet kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: If a matching menu command or designer verb is located, the command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tilsvarende kommando eller designer verbet ligger, aktiveres kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> of the command to search for and execute.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> for å søke etter og kjøre-kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command was found and invoked successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kommandoen ble funnet og aktiveres feil. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified standard menu command from the menu.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den angitte standard kommandoen fra listen.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> if it is found.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner det angitte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>Hvis den finnes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: This method does not raise an exception or return a value if the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is not found.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke utløse et unntak eller returnere en verdi hvis den angitte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>finnes ikke.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> matching a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> is located on a menu.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>metode for å fastslå om en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>samsvarer med et angitt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>er plassert på en meny.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified designer verb from the collection of global designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte designer verbet fra samlingen av global designer verb.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the specified global designer verb if it is within the global designer verbs collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner det angitte globale designer verbet hvis den er i samlingen globale designer verb.

trans-unit.source: You can add a designer verb to the global designer verbs collection using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til et designer verb globale designer verb-samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Shows the specified shortcut menu at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Viser den angitte hurtigmenyen på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The ShowContextMenu method can display any of the following Visual Studio shortcut menus containing menu commands at a specified point: |Menu|CommandID| |----------|---------------| |The shortcut menu displayed for a container|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for the component tray|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for a selection|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for a tray selection|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu>| This method can also display other registered shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ShowContextMenu kan vise noen av de følgende Visual Studio hurtigmenyene som inneholder kommandoer i et angitt punkt: | Menyen | CommandID | |----------|---------------| | Vise hurtigmenyen for en beholder | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>| | Vise hurtigmenyen for komponenten skuffen | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu>| | Vise hurtigmenyen for et utvalg | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu>| | Vise hurtigmenyen for skuffen noe | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu>| Denne metoden kan også vise andre registrerte hurtigmenyer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> for the shortcut menu to show.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> for hurtigmenyen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to display the menu, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten som skal vises på menyen i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to display the menu, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten som skal vises på menyen i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av designer verb som er tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: The set of currently available designer verbs consists of all global designer verbs, which are added by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method on this interface, and individual designer verbs, which are offered by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of individual designers.
trans-unit.target: Settet med tilgjengelige designer verb består av alle globale designer verb, som er lagt til av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>-metoden på dette grensesnittet og individuelle designer verb som tilbys av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>for individuelle utviklere.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis navnet på et global verb som er i konflikt med navnet på et designer verb, blir det angitte designer designer verbet gjeldende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> som inneholder designer verb som er tilgjengelige.
